thread.title: CCTV reveals how four-pawed culprit caused glass shop door to smash into pieces - Yahoo7
thread.title_full: CCTV reveals how four-pawed culprit caused glass shop door to smash into pieces - Yahoo7

author: Mel Buttigieg
title: CCTV reveals how four-pawed culprit caused glass shop door to smash into pieces - Yahoo7
text:
Share CCTV reveals how four-pawed culprit caused glass shop door to smash into pieces - Yahoo7 CCTV footage solved the mystery of how a shop glass door smashed to pieces in a matter of seconds with no culprit in sight. Close CCTV reveals mystery of how shop glass door became broken UP NEXT VIDEO CCTV reveals mystery of how shop glass door became broken CCTV reveals mystery of how shop glass door became broken 
A Chinese shop owner checked the security recording from a camera which monitored the front door, and caught the trouble-makers in the act. 
The six-second video, date-stamped on Monday just after 1pm, shows a black cat scamper past the shop front. A black cat races ahed, with a dog chasing closely behind. Pictures: People's Daily, China/YouTube The dog slams into the open glass window, sending it flying from its hinges. Picture: People's Daily, China/YouTube 
Seconds later, a black dog can be seen chasing after the feline, but during the commotion, the larger, less agile animal slams face-first into the open door's glass panel. 
The woofer bounces back from the impact while knocking the door from its hinges and sending it crashing to the ground outside. 
Without skipping a beat, the dog scrambles back on its four paws and continues its pursuit, unaware of the path of destruction left in its wake. 
Newsbreak â€“ February 23
